CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 3, 1959, pg. A16, reads: "One For Three - A combination of three brothers teamed as Pittsburgh Courier newsboys and won a bicycle for averaging 100 sales a week for the past four years. They are Fred, Edward and James Becton, sone of Mr. and Mrs. Edward Anderson, 6607 Frankstown Ave.  All three are enrolled at Lincoln Grade School.  Edward and Fred want to be firemen, and James wants to be a minister.  Distributor Donald Williams made the presentation. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Donald Williams standing behind Pittsburgh Courier newspaper boys and brothers Fred, Edward, and James Becton posed with bicycle outside Courier office, Centre Avenue, Hill District
